member.name: T:PalmSens.Core.Linux.Comm.FTDI.D2XXNative.FT_DEVICE_INFO_NODE
member.summary: Type that holds device information for GetDeviceInformation method. Used with FT_GetDeviceInfo and FT_GetDeviceInfoDetail in FTD2XX.DLL

member.name: F:PalmSens.Core.Linux.Comm.FTDI.D2XXNative.FT_DEVICE_INFO_NODE.Flags
member.summary: Indicates device state. Can be any combination of the following: FT_FLAGS_OPENED, FT_FLAGS_HISPEED

member.name: F:PalmSens.Core.Linux.Comm.FTDI.D2XXNative.FT_DEVICE_INFO_NODE.Type
member.summary: Indicates the device type. Can be one of the following: FT_DEVICE_232R, FT_DEVICE_2232C, FT_DEVICE_BM, FT_DEVICE_AM, FT_DEVICE_100AX or FT_DEVICE_UNKNOWN

member.name: F:PalmSens.Core.Linux.Comm.FTDI.D2XXNative.FT_DEVICE_INFO_NODE.ID
member.summary: The Vendor ID and Product ID of the device

member.name: F:PalmSens.Core.Linux.Comm.FTDI.D2XXNative.FT_DEVICE_INFO_NODE.LocId
member.summary: The physical location identifier of the device

member.name: F:PalmSens.Core.Linux.Comm.FTDI.D2XXNative.FT_DEVICE_INFO_NODE.ftHandle
member.summary: The device handle. This value is not used externally and is provided for information only. If the device is not open, this value is 0.
